title: Can I get Harry Potter books online for free? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can. Legally though? Not so much, unless you’re prepared to wait 70 years after Rowling’s death. Nevertheless, Harry Potter is a hugely popular franchise which was eventually published as an e-book, making it even easier to share it online. If buying the e-book isn’t an option you’re willing to consider, you can always try filetype:epub or filetype:pdf search on Google (which tends to include a handful of scamming sites) or some file sharing websites, etc. It shouldn’t be much of a hassle to find, given its popularity.
